titleInfo.title: Letter no.2172 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of the Resident in the Persian Gulf, Captain Arnold Kemballâ€™s earlier letter relating to tribe movements on the Arab coast. Anderson writes that the Government approves of proceedings.
